channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Socializer – Simple & Easy Social Media Share Icons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Socializer – Simple & Easy Social Media Share Icons

item.title: CVE-2022-2763|2024-08-03T00:46:04.506Z -- unknown -- wp%20socializer%20%E2%80%93%20simple%20%26%20easy%20social%20media%20share%20icons
item.description: The WP Socializer WordPress plugin before 7.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its Icons settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
